scripts.b: yarn && yarn cleanup && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs
scripts.release:major: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm publish --tag latest && yarn commit-new-version
scripts.release:minor: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish --tag latest && yarn commit-new-version
scripts.release:patch: yarn b && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish --tag latest && yarn commit-new-version
scripts.commit-new-version: git add package.json && git commit -m 'version dump' && git push
